snippet: African leaders have voted to give themselves immunity from prosecution for crimes against humanity, war crimes and genocide in an African human rights court that does not yet exist.

byline.original: By ADAM NOSSITER and MARLISE SIMONS

lead_paragraph: African leaders have voted to give themselves immunity from prosecution for crimes against humanity, war crimes and genocide in an African human rights court that does not yet exist.

headline.main: African Leaders Grant Themselves Immunity in Proposed Court
headline.print_headline: Equatorial Guinea: African Leaders Grant Themselves Immunity

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
